original_text: And it came to pass, as I lifted up my voice and cried, that he left his garment with me, and fled out.
korean_text: 내가 소리 질러 불렀더니 그가 그의 옷을 내게 버려두고 밖으로 도망하여 나갔나이다

sentences.original_text: as I lifted up my voice and cried
that he left his garment with me
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 옷을 나와 함께 두고
